title: Take the Stage, Mr. President
text:
Ignore all the impeachment drama in Washington. To witness presidential politics in true theatrical form, head straight to Broadway.

The Great White Way has been home to many plays and musicals that explore the life and times of our commanders in chief. The newest example: “The Great Society,” playwright Robert Schenkkan’s look at Lyndon B. Johnson’s presidency as the Texas-born leader pushed for a social-minded domestic agenda while also grappling with the war in Vietnam. The production, featuring the Scottish actor Brian...
